Scene:
Lady Ano's Reports to Hisayoshi
(Tsubone chūshin / 局注進)

Play: The Tycoon's Exploit (絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

Production: April 1974 Asahiza



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kinshi IV (野澤錦糸 (四))
